Title: Come to the Stable

Description: Directed by Henry Koster.  With Loretta Young, Celeste Holm, Hugh Marlowe, Elsa Lanchester. Two nuns from a French convent arrive in a small New England town with a plan to build a children's hospital. They enlist the help of several colorful characters in achieving their dream including a struggling artist, a popular composer, and a renowned racketeer.
